snippet.title: EchoTrailer
snippet.description:
Available for free on itch: https://lions-vultures.itch.io/echo

Echo was created during a four week project which aimed to focus on narrative, and where no text or cutscenes where allowed. Story elements are conveyed through environment and gameplay.
